data.comment: Today's referee, David Coote, has blown to start the match.
Leeds have a goal kick.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Leeds close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Leeds.
Patrick Bamford of Leeds gets in a strike, but is off target.
David Coote awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Can Leeds capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Leeds push upfield and Patrick Bamford gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Wolverhampton defence.
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Leeds have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Leeds drive forward but Patrick Bamford is judged offside.
Throw-in Leeds.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Leeds.
David Coote signals a throw-in for Leeds, close to Wolverhampton's area.
Rodrigo Moreno (Leeds) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Daniel Podence.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
Daniel Podence returns to the field for Wolverhampton after picking up a slight injury.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
In the minute 15, Luke Ayling is booked for the home team.
David Coote signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 16, Leeds's Helder Costa misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Elland Road.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 24, David Coote signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leeds have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Free kick Leeds.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Elland Road.
In the minute 28, Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
In Leeds Wolverhampton's Daniel Podence is caught offside.
In the minute 31, Can Leeds capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolverhampton's half?
Leeds push forward at Elland Road and Luke Ayling gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Wolverhampton defence.
Rodrigo Moreno (Leeds) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 32, David Coote awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton surge into the attack at Elland Road but Raul Jimenezâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 35, Leeds have a goal kick.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Leeds in Leeds.
In the minute 37, Leeds are pushing forward but Patrick Bamford's finish is wide of the goal.
David Coote awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
David Coote signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 39, David Coote signals a Leeds throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Jack Harrison (Leeds) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 40, Leeds have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Leeds drives forward and Rodrigo Moreno gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
In the minute 43, Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
In Leeds a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, David Coote will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
Daniel Podence for Wolverhampton drives towards goal at Elland Road. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Elland Road.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, David Coote signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Throw-in for Leeds at Elland Road.
David Coote signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Leeds in the half of Wolverhampton.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Wolverhampton.
David Coote signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton's Daniel Podence is whistled for offside at Elland Road.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Leeds.
Leeds needs to be cautious. Wolverhampton have an attacking throw-in.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
In the minute 58, Wolverhampton are coming forward and Raul Jimenez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 61, Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Kalvin Phillips for Leeds has been booked by David Coote and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 63, Joao Moutinho is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
Wolverhampton's Joao Moutinho looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 65, Throw-in Leeds.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
Adama Traore is replacing Daniel Podence for Wolverhampton at Elland Road.
In the minute 66, David Coote signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Joao Moutinho (Wolverhampton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Elland Road.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Goal! Raul Jimenez gives Wolverhampton a 0-1 lead.
Max Kilman with an assist there.
In the minute 71, The home team have replaced Helder Costa with Ian Poveda. This is the first substitution made today by Marcelo Bielsa.
The match at Elland Road has been interrupted briefly for a check on Pascal Struijk, who is down injured.
In Leeds a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 74, Wolverhampton drive upfield and Pedro Neto gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leeds defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Wolverhampton in Leeds.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
In the minute 75, Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pascal Struijk, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Pablo Hernandez is the substitute for Leeds.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, Free kick Wolverhampton.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
Pablo Hernandez (Leeds) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 81, Leeds have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Leeds make their third substitution with Raphinha replacing Jack Harrison.
In the minute 82, The away team replace Joao Moutinho with Ruben Neves.
Ian Poveda (Leeds) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Elland Road.
In the minute 85, Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
David Coote awards Leeds a goal kick.
In the minute 87, David Coote awards the away team a throw-in.
Wolverhampton needs to be cautious. Leeds have an attacking throw-in.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
David Coote signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 89, Nuno Espirito Santo is making the team's third substitution at Elland Road with Fernando Marcal replacing Pedro Neto.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in the half of Leeds.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Leeds.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
Throw-in Leeds.
Important block from the Leeds defence as Ruben Neves fires in a strike for Wolverhampton.
In Leeds, Ruben Neves of Wolverhampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
In Leeds a free kick has been awarded the home team.
David Coote signals a Leeds throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Wolverhampton.
That's full-time at Elland Road. The final score is 0-1.
